sentences.en: Don't forget to sprinkle the flowers in the flower box.
sentences.cn: 不要忘记给花盒里的花浇水.

sentences.en: He wanted to tell her to sprinkle the floor.
sentences.cn: 他想告诉她在地上洒点水.

sentences.en: Place the fish on a flat surface and sprinkle the flesh with lemon juice and pepper.
sentences.cn: 将鱼放在案面上并在鱼肉上撒柠檬汁和胡椒粉。

sentences.en: She put a sprinkle of sugar on the top of her cake.
sentences.cn: 她在蛋糕上洒了一点糖.

sentences.en: Sprinkle a little salt on the rice.
Sprinkle some water before you sweep.
Sprinkle sugar evenly over the top of the cake.
sentences.cn: 把糖均匀地撒在蛋糕上.

sentences.en: Sprinkle the avocado slices with lemon juice.
sentences.cn: 将柠檬汁洒在鳄梨片上.

sentences.en: Sprinkle the meat with salt and place in the pan.
sentences.cn: 在肉上撒上盐，然后放进平底锅。

sentences.en: The cook put a sprinkle of pepper into the soup.
sentences.cn: 厨师在汤里放了一点胡椒.

sentences.en: We had a sprinkle this morning.
sentences.cn: 我们这里今天上午下了点毛毛细雨.

sentences.en: When they have a lot of company, they just sprinkle tents about in the woods.
sentences.cn: 客人多了他们就在林中搭上很多帐蓬.

trans.tran_en: a small amount of something, especially scattered on top of something
to scatter small drops of liquid or small pieces of something
to scatter small drops of liquid or small pieces of something
